item.title: NCSOFT open-world MMO tactical shooter Project LLL officially titled CINDER CITY
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Official website and social accounts launched.

Project LLL, the new “massively multiplayer online tactical shooter” currently in development for consoles and PC from publisher NCSOFT and development subsidiary BigFire Games, will be officially titled CINDER CITY, the companies announced.

CINDER CITY will feature dynamic graphics built on Unreal Engine 5 and a “seamless” open world. The game is a history-altering science fiction story where 23rd century future technology coexists with the 21st century present. Set in a “devastated futuristic Seoul” modeled after actual districts like Samseong-dong and Nonhyeon-dong, it promises realistic combat mechanics that reflect firearm operating principles.

NCSOFT also launched an official website, Twitter account, Facebook page, and YouTube channel for the game.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/ncsoft-open-world-mmo-tactical-shooter-project-lll-officially-titled-cinder-city
